item.title: About Me
item.description: Who am I? The guy who wants to be tech God. HiðŸ‘‹, my name is Beyrak, and I am a CS student at Baku State University. I love to be in the technology industry because technology is developing every day, faster than the previous day. Hence, Cyber-security is an inevitable part of this sector. Iâ€™m very interested in Cyber-security and have been learning about it for 2 years. Now I can say that cyber-security has become part of my life.
